name: Joseph Coltharp
text:
Fantastic 6 dollar single topping on Tuesday's.....great workers i was there a halfhour...i didn't call ahead or use the Godfathers app...
Seen at least 20 pizzas being carried out for other people...
Its a popular place

name: Tim Robinson
text: Good service

name: Amanda Daniels
text: Pizza was nasty, cashier rude and so was the manager... will not return to this location and this location doesn't reflect other God fathers

name: James M
text: The employees were very polite and the pizza was as good as ever.

name: Nancy Donovan
text: Excellent Pizza!  Always ready when they say it will be.

name: Paul Green
text: Great deal for a quick slice. Fair price. Friendly helpful staff. I'll be back.

name: Randy Purinton
text: It'll work in a pinch

name: Christopher Lisska
text: The staff is always friendly, and this is pretty good pizza to pick up when on the go! Seems consistently greasy for my preference, but the pizza is good. Several other options exist on the menu beyond pizza, including breakfast choices in â€¦More

name: Harold Taylor
text: STEVAN AND EVAN ARE EXCELLENT WITH ALL CUSTOMERS.EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE.VERY DEDICATED AND ALSO AN ASSET TO THE CORPORATION.SUCH A JOY TO SEE THESE YOUNG MEN HARD AT WORK.KUDOS TO THESE YOUNG MEN.

name: Teresa
text: We didn't even know that we had a Godfathers Express . The pizza was great & super close

name: Ryan Ochs
text: Pizza and appetizers are actually quite tasty despite being attached to a gas station

name: *Sasha*
text: Barely any toppings on the combo pizza, and the staff was very unprofessional. Will not ever be going back. Best off sticking to an actual store location.

name: Jerry F. Danaher
text: Our family loved their Pepperoni Pizza.

name: gary harms
text: Best pizza by the slice in Raytown MO. PERIOD!

name: azsisterfriend
text: Great service. Pizza by slice, hot,  ready, and good or order a whole pie. I had trouble finding it because I didn't see anywhere that it said it was located INSIDE the MinitMart.

name: Rod Wiggins
text: This one is the best of the 3 in Raytown. Thanks for always getting it fast and right

name: Carl Gregory
text: It was great . Loved the food !

name: Antwan Johnson
text: Good pizza. It's very expensive unlesss you catch a sale or have a coupon.  There is no reason that they should be that much more expensive than Pizza hut.

name: Kasey Keck
text: Use to be really good.  Now everytime we order online they call back because they are out of something. Wait time inside has station has went up as well.  Use to be friendly staff now old, cranky, slow, and look drugged out staff in there.

name: Carol Uzueta
text: VERY Good pizza and good service.They are fast and friendly, got to use a coupon tho to save some money with them but so worth it.

name: Dean Bosworth
text:
Great customer serviceðŸ˜ƒ
Pizza is piping hot and taste great!

name: Donald Eaton
text: Good customer service is awesome and will be back for more

name: emily matthews
text: always delicious and well prepared.

name: Marvale Pulluaim
text: Great People! Great Pizza!

name: marty Young
text: Nothing but love ........all good.baby baby try it will make.you wanna smack yo moma

name: FAST EDDIE P.
text: Fast

name: Cj Mathews
text: My fav of all time need more

name: Ernestine Winn
text: Godfathers pizza was the bomb

name: Susan Hodges
text: Yum

name: L Strong
text: Love it

name: Adam Hurshman
text: When I called they were not very helpful and when I went to pickup the pizza,  they couldn't find my order.

name: garland rankine
text: Pizza and Bread Sticks where great.
